A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I analyzed well: Snoke's death was unnecessary\, in fact his true power and origin was not known.
Luke: Ok\, it was an epic ending but it generates a Why\, it does not make sense\, you see that Disney wants to kill the Skywalkers.

No duels with the saber\, I seriously expected Luke and Snoke to meet.

Phasma and Snoke were characters with a wasted history they had potential.

The origin of Ray is very trash

Jokes in moments where there must be seriousness.

Leia: floating in space in the Mary Poppins style.

The movie is a mix of all the movies\, I do not know but the first scene reminds me of the Battle of Hoth. The empire finds them in their secret base and they have to flee all made trash.

It has iconic moments\, good development in some characters but for the main characters a bad development and a terrible final.
